Icons

Icons can be used to help users to understand an action.

  1. System icons

1. System icons

We use the Font Awesome icon font for our icons. This is a list of the most popular.

Icon Label CSS class name
Burger menu fa-bars
Phone fa-phone
Chevron left fa-chevron-left
Chevron right fa-chevron-right
Chevron down fa-chevron-down
Chevron up fa-chevron-up
Square bullet fa-square-full
Circle large fa-circle
Close fa-times
